hits.Title: Rummikub

hits.Title: Politon
hits.Description: Politon is a turn-based strategy game with easy-to-understand mechanics and satisfying visuals. If you want to test your strategical logic against enemies of different numbers and difficulty levels, Politon offers a variety of hex-based maps with various terrains. You'll need to manage your economy while expanding your territories and defend your region against rival invasions.
hits.Instructions: Point and click on tiles to select the region you want to manage. Then click on building cards to select which units you want to recruit. Expand your regions by moving units around and defeat your enemies.
hits.Key Features: The game features four types of units, three building types, and hex grid maps waiting to be conquered. The unit types are arranged from weakest to strongest: Peasant, Militia, Baron, and Knight. Each hex grid allows one unit or building to be placed, and each unit has one movement point per turn. To afford the cost of units and their maintenance, you must expand your territory and strengthen your economy by building Farms. You can opt to place Outposts or Watchtowers to form defensive lines. Enhance your economy by collecting resources from the terrain or strategically spreading your influence by waiting for a few turns. The joy of victory lies in eliminating all your enemies.

hits.Title: The Walking Deadblocks
hits.Description: A fast-paced, cooperative survival game where players battle relentless waves of zombies across dynamic day-night cycles. Survive as long as possible by managing resources, unlocking new maps, and utilizing unique character abilities. Nights bring increased danger with randomized enemy spawns, challenging players to strategize using generators and lights to stay alive.
hits.Instructions:
•	Single Player Mode:
          o	Movement: W, A, S, D
          o	Shooting: SPACE
          o	Weapon Switching: Use Q, E, or keys 1-5
•	Co-op Mode:
          o	Player 1:
                 	Movement: Arrow keys
                 	Shooting: L
                 	Weapon Switching: Use "," and "."
          o	Player 2:
                 	Movement: W, A, S, D
                 	Shooting: SPACE
                 	Weapon Switching: Use Q and E
hits.Key Features:
The game is a single-player and co-op PvE shooter. It is a survival game featuring a wave system and a dynamic day/night cycle. Each wave incorporates a looping 24-hour system with five distinct times of day, where enemy spawn rates vary. Mornings are easier, while nights introduce randomized enemy spawns for added tension.

There are three types of enemies:

Zombies: Slow, small melee enemies with low damage.
Infectious: Ranged enemies with area-of-effect attacks.
Chargers: Large, fast melee enemies that deal high damage.
Players can choose from four distinct characters, each with unique abilities:

Wrench: Deploys a turret.
Glimmer: Deploys a light tower.
Dash: Deploys an electric trap that slows down enemies.
Sentinel: Deploys a shield.

Common items include seven types of weapons and four types of deployables:

Weapons: Pistol, Uzi, Shotgun, Rocket Launcher, Sniper Rifle, Flamethrower, Grenade Launcher 
Deployables:Wall, Barrel, C4, Mines.

The game features three different maps. One map is free to play, while the other two must be unlocked by collecting points earned in the currently accessible maps. Points are accumulated by defeating enemies.

hits.Key Features:
Choose Your Role: Play as the mother, father, child, police officer, or thief, each with distinct abilities and objectives in the game.

Immersive Environments: Explore various settings such as family homes, parks, and city streets, each filled with hiding spots, secrets, and challenges.

Offline Multiplayer: Enjoy offline gameplay with friends and family, encouraging social interaction and cooperative play.

Dynamic Gameplay: Experience thrilling hide-and-seek action with evolving roles and strategies for each character.

Unique Objectives: Fulfill specific objectives based on your chosen character—find your child, collect chocolates, apprehend the thief, or evade capture as the thief.

Strategic Challenges: Use observation, stealth, and quick thinking to succeed in each round, enhancing your skills with every game.

Family-Friendly Fun: Suitable for all ages, 'Hide & Seek - Family Edition' promotes bonding and laughter among players.

Nostalgic Appeal: Capture the essence of childhood games with modern twists, appealing to both new players and those seeking nostalgia.

Easy to Play, Hard to Master: Simple controls make it accessible for everyone, while deeper gameplay mechanics offer challenges for experienced gamers.

Regular Updates: Stay engaged with ongoing updates, new environments, and additional features to keep the game fresh and exciting.

hits.Title: Stack Crash Ball
hits.Description:
Stack Crash Ball is a 3d casual game where players smash, bump and bounce through revolving helix stacks to reach the end.
Sound easy? You wish!!
Your ball smashes like a brick through colorful stacks that block its descent, but if you hit a black one, it's all over! Your ball shatters to pieces and you have to start your fall all over again.
But even black stacks are no match for a fireball falling at full speed! Choose your strategy: speed up like a madman or stop and wait for your next chance to roll and jump.

Stack Crash Ball is a super fun and addictive one touch casual game.
Press and hold on the screen and let the ball go down without touching the obstacles! Hold as long as possible to make combo and break the black stacks. Let the ball fall down from the helix stacks.
hits.Instructions:
How to Play
- Just hold your finger to increase the rate of ball fall.
- Don't break or touch the black stacks.
- When Tapping Action Continuously Happen The Stack Ball Change Into The Fire Ball.
- Help your ball to reach the bottom of the tower.

Feature
- Crazy fast speed
- Fun and addictive gameplay
- Simple and easy to play
- Great time killer

3) Nothing. In this case you know that none of the adjacent squares have mines, and they will be automatically opened as well.

hits.Description: Interior Designer: Unpacking House is a delightful and relaxing casual game that allows you to explore your creativity through interior design. Whether you’re tackling specific challenges or letting your imagination run wild, this game offers an immersive experience where you can design beautiful spaces and create captivating aesthetics.
hits.Instructions:
== PC Controls ==

- Hold LMB to drag item
- Release LMB to drop item
- Press R to rotate item (while holding it)
- Hold Middle Mouse Button to move camera
- Use Mouse Wheel to zoom in/out

== Mobile Controls ==

- Hold to move the item
- Release to place the item
- Drag the item to the trash can icon to delete it (sandbox mode)
- While holding the item, tap with second finger to rotate it
hits.Key Features:
- 3 Game Modes: Sandbox, Levels, Cleaning
- More than 1500 furniture items
- Intuitive Controls
- Soft Graphics
- Relaxing Music

hits.Title: Christmas Rush
hits.Description: Santa's terribly late for delivering gifts! Help him picking gift packs to give to good children. Avoid obstacles along the way to survive as long as possible. Collect the glittering stars to get a magical power-up!
hits.Instructions:
Desktop: Press up/down arrow buttons to move the character.
Mobile: swipe up or down to move the character.

hits.Title: AC Plano
hits.Description:
Have you ever dream of driving an extremely modified plane, which is nothing but a killing machine? Fly and race your plane in 3d environments, now in survival fighting plane racing game. Play customized world war 2 modified planes in challenging racing setup with exciting levels, power ups  and real 3D physics environments. 
Best war plane simulator out there!
hits.Instructions:
- Arrow keys (Up, Down, Left, Right) Keys for player 1
- Turn: Left | Right | Up | Down
- Booster: X
- Break: C
- Power-up: Space
- Camera: N
- Pause: P or Escape
Player 2 movement Keys
- WASD keys (W, A, S, D) Keys for player 2
You can set your own keys also.
hits.Key Features:
Complete race system
-Booster cool down system
-Enemy AI
-Dogfight system with 5 weapons (machine gun, missiles, mines, shield and repair)
-Alternative routes/Shortcuts 
-Solo and 2 player human versus modes
-3 Unique Game play modes (Championship, Arcade and Time Trial)
-3 difficulty levels
-Local Leader board
-Unlock system: items or tracks unlock as the player progresses
-Cool Countdowns
And mostly importantly fun for you!

hits.Title: FNF 2 Player
hits.Description:
FNF 2 Player allows two players to play at the same time. Players can compete with each other by choosing the characters they want. The difficulty level can be determined by the music, thus appealing to all types of players.

Game Modes: 

- Story Mode: You fight with new characters weekly.
- Freeplay Mode: You can play by choosing the song you want.
- 2 Player Mode: It's time to duel with your friend.
hits.Instructions:
Controls: The first player uses the "ARROW KEYS", while the second player uses the "W, A, S, D" keys.

Game Purpose: To defeat your opponent by pressing the arrows that appear on the screen at the right time. While correct moves increase your score, mistakes cause a loss of points. You should hold down the button according to the length of the arrow for long arrows.

hits.Title: War State IO - Conquer Battles
hits.Description:
Welcome to ultimate strategy game that lets you improve your tactical skills and lead your troops to triumph! 

Lead your army, conquer enemy camps, and expand your territory in fast-paced battles filled with action and strategy.

Every decision matters — whether you’re attacking enemy strongholds or defending your bases, clever maneuvers are key to achieving victory.
hits.Instructions:
Drag your troops with your mouse/finger to the building you want to occupy.
Occupy all enemy buildings to win.

hits.Title: Oil Tanker Transport Truck
hits.Description: Let's go on to ride with an oil tanker transporter truck across all the continents like the Euro, Asia, and America oil transporter truck game has real features in the Euro and American cargo systems of the fuel truck.
hits.Instructions: Use W,A,S,D for player movement.
